Release Notes 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Cold Cop, Bad Cop, It's In the Blood 
ORIGINAL TITLE: Cold&Dark 
COUNTRY: UK 
DIRECTOR: Andrew Goth 
SCREENWRITER: Joanne Reay 
CAST: Luke Goss, David Baker, Michael Culkin, Steven Elder, David Gant, Kevin 
Howarth, Matt Lucas, Phys Moosa, Carly Turnball, Dan van Husen, James Whalea 
STUDIO/PRODUCER: First Look Home Entertainment 

When Detective Mortimer Shade (Kevin Howarth) is somehow killed in a freezer, 
a parasite called a grail possesses his body, revives him, but he needs blood 
to stay alive. His partner John Dark (Luke Goss) accepts the new situation and 
together they become vigilantes, judging and killing the bad guys, with Shade 
sucking their blood with his claw. However, Dark notes that Shade is losing the 
rest of his humanity and becoming a monster, being aware and afraid of the 
danger Shade represents to mankind and trying to stop him.
